content: आशु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अश्-व्याप्तौ उण्] Fast, quick. --शुः <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} ‘The quick one’, a horse. {@--2@} Rice (ripening quickly in the rainy season). --शु {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Fast, quickly, immediately, directly; वर्त्म भानोस्त्यजाशु <ls>Me. 39</ls>, <ls n="Me.">22.</ls> [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%acu%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%okus%}.].
